registration.label: 非常感谢您下载EmoMap！开始使用之前，请您提供一些信息。
registration.confirm1: 我已经18岁以上，并且同意参与这个研究。
registration.confirm2: 我知道我可以随时退出这个研究。

info.about:
EmoMap (Emotional Mapping) 是is part of a research project at the Vienna University of Technology, Austria, which aims to collect people's affective/emotional responses towards different environment.
You can use EmoMap in an offline manner, however, we currently only cache the map data of the Como area (Italy). For other areas, we recommend to enable the Internet connection.
info.data: What data will I be sharing? 当While you report your feelings, your mobile phone's GPS estimates your current location. Your answers and location information are then anonymously and securely sent to our database. We don't ask for your name or any other identifying information. Therefore, we won't know who you are.
info.use: How will the data be used? 这些数据The data contributed are solely used for academic research purposes. We aim to investigate how people affectively response to different environments, and how these affective responses influence their behaviors, e.g, approaching or avoiding particular places.
info.thanks: Acknowledgments. 非常感谢Big thanks should be given to Austrian FFG for funding the EmoMap project, to Salzburg Research and Rittberger+Knapp OG for their cooperation in the project, as well as to colleagues from Politecnico di Milano for their encouragement and Italian translation.
info.contact:
了解更多信息，请浏览 cartography.tuwien.ac.at 或者联系 apps@cartography.tuwien.ac.at.
谢谢您的关注！

messages.registration-form-empty: 请提供完整的注册信息!
messages.geolocation-error: 无法获取您的当前位置信息!
messages.registration-success: 谢谢您！您现在可以开始创建您的情感地图（EmoMap）了!
messages.marker-popup: 不是你的当前位置? 拖动图标进行调整!
messages.allemomap-nointernet: 由于没有网络连接，“所有人的地图All Map”已被禁用!
messages.registration-noInternet: 由于没有网络连接，注册失败!

stat.scale: 在1（“非常令人不愉快的”）到7（“非常令人愉快的”）的尺度上。
stat.total_all: 在周围5公里以内，总共有
stat.avg_all: 个贡献。 它们的平均值为
stat.nopoint: 周围5公里以内还没有任何贡献。
